summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It records the official inmate count by housing unit, totaling 776 inmates, and includes a specific roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (under the name Tisdale, which is his known Bureau of Prisons alias).

persons.name: Tisdale
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 78359-053, assigned to the hospital (HOSP) unit. This is the known Bureau of Prisons alias for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total of 776 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 23, 2019, which is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his cell (he died by suicide on August 10, 2019).
The inmate roster lists 'Tisdale' (registration 78359-053) as assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital), indicating Epstein was in the medical unit on this date.
The total inmate count for the facility was 776 individuals.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative record, providing a snapshot of the prison population on a specific date.
Epstein is referenced under his known Bureau of Prisons alias 'Tisdale', not his legal name.
